message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you now, as the value of the money will decrease in further rounds.
I think it's fair that we split the money more evenly. Let's each take 60%.
Bob, the value for you is decreasing rapidly. Let's be reasonable. I'll take $65, you take $35. It's better than what you'll get in the next round!
